#summary The <script> Tag

= Introduction =

The `<script>` tag enables the inclusion of supplementary JavaScript for the character sheet.


= Details =

Every Nerdcules character sheet may have one `<script>` tag. This is an optional tag, which must appear inside the [TagHead <head>] tag. The `<script>` is eighth in sequence, appearing after the optional [TagStyle <style>] tag.

The `<script>` tag can contain any valid JavaScript

== Example ==

{{{
<sheet>
  <head>
    <script>
      place any valid JavaScript here
    </script>
  </head>
</sheet>
}}}
